title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama GitHub repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running LLMs locally with a CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; sync & async APIs, streaming support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; model management, chat history, multi-user.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent API, streaming, embeddings, custom options.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama; simple interface to chat, generate, pull, list models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI wrapper around Ollama REST API with TUI model picker.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline GitHub Copilot-like assistant.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models for QA & RAG pipelines.

title: ollama.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to chat with Ollama models inside buffers; customizable prompts.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI for Ollama; supports multiple models, session memory, Docker.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain to chat over documents.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stacks for CPU & GPU (nvidia) Ollama setups.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that chats using Ollama models; slash commands, streaming.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot starter auto-configuring Ollama Java client for REST controllers.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama; generate, chat, pull, list with context cancellation.
